fields.request: Validate change configuration command on charger status page
fields.request_details: Open a connected charge point status page in the operator dashboard and locate the Change configuration card. Submit a known key/value pair (for example HeartbeatInterval=120), confirm the UI reports success, and verify the charger log records the ChangeConfiguration request and response. Finally, confirm a configuration snapshot reflects the updated value or that a rejection is surfaced if the device declines the change.
